 We look forward to receiving your application. Feel free to contact Emmy Aho at +4676 513 40 22 or 010 332 29 20 with any questions regarding the listed position. Please note that to apply for this position you need to be an EU citizen or have a valid Swedish working permit.

title: Brand Manager - Rx
description:
**Job Title:** 
**Brand Manager - Rx** 




**Location: Stockholm, Sweden OR, Denmark, Copenhagen** 








 Galderma Nordics is looking for a Brand Manager - Rx to join the team.
 



 As the Brand Manager, you will be accountable for driving the growth of our Rx - Therapeutic Dermatology business in the Nordics region through on-the-ground marketing efforts that are aligned with global marketing guidelines but deliver immediate ROI to the business.
 







 To succeed in this role, you will use your strategic skills, operationally engage and work together with the team, build internal and external networks, ensure alignment with other functions, and interact well in our cross functional environment. There are great opportunities to operate for an entrepreneurial, creative mind.
 







**Key Tasks** 



* Develop and implement marketing programs tailored to the Nordics market and aligned with global marketing strategy.
* Execute marketing plans to achieve business objectives and deliver ROI.
* Work closely with cross-functional teams including sales, product development, and customer service to ensure seamless execution of marketing initiatives
* Develop and maintain relationships with key stakeholders in the Nordics region, including customers, influencers, and partners.
* Analyze market trends, consumer insights, and competitive activity to inform marketing strategies and tactics
* Manage and optimize marketing budgets to maximize ROI and drive business growth.
* Work with global marketing teams to share best practices, leverage existing assets, and ensure consistency in branding and messaging.
* You will be an important voice for the Nordic region in our global organization
* Support Corporate and Key Accounts in developing innovative concepts to attract, retain, and convert patients.
* Co-development of (digital) campaigns (e.g., social media, video content) to engage consumers, leveraging national 360° marketing campaigns to drive awareness and traffic to clinics.







**Skills & Qualifications** 



* Degree in Marketing or related field.
* Experience in marketing or brand management, pharmaceutical experience - biologics experience is advantageous.
* Knowledge of the pharma regulatory environment and how it impacts marketing.
* Ability to think strategically, while also being highly operational and tactical.
* Track record of executing successful marketing campaigns and ability to manage multiple projects. Simultaneously.
* Ability to use data to inform marketing decisions.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams and external stakeholders
* Fluent in English and one or more Nordic languages
* Result driven
* Solution- and action oriented (Make things happen)
* Collaborative team player
* Structured with project lead skills
* Agile mindset and embrace dynamic business opportunities







**What we offer in return** 








**We offer you the chance to work with premium aesthetic brands that are backed by science.** 




  

 Galderma is the world's largest independent dermatology company, present in approximately 100 countries. Since our inception in 1981, we have been driven by a complete dedication to dermatology. We deliver an innovative, science-based portfolio of sophisticated brands and services across Aesthetics, Consumer Care and Prescription Medicine. Focused on the needs of consumers and patients, we work in partnership with healthcare professionals to ensure superior outcomes. Because we understand that the skin we're in shapes our life stories, we are advancing dermatology for every skin story. For more information, please visit our website:
 **https://www.galderma.com/careers** 








**Next Steps** 



* If your profile is a match, we will invite you for a first virtual conversation with the recruiter.
* The next step is a virtual conversation with the hiring manager
* The final step is a panel conversation with the extended team







**Our people make a difference**
 At Galderma, you'll work with people who are like you. And people that are different. We value what every member of our team brings. Professionalism, collaboration, and a friendly, supportive ethos is the perfect environment for people to thrive and excel in what they do.

title: Inventory Planner
description:
**Inventory Planner( Maternity cover)**
 Every day, we get opportunities to make a positive impact – on our colleagues, partners, customers and society. Together, we’re pioneering the solutions of the future and unlocking the full potential of precious resources. Trusted to act on initiative, we challenge conventional thinking to develop world-leading technologies that inspire progress in vital areas, including energy, food, water and shipping.
   

  

 As we push forward, the innovative, open spirit that fuels our 140-year-old start-up culture and rapid growth also drives our personal growth. So, as we shape a more resourceful, less wasteful world, we build our careers too.
   

  

 Alfa Laval is currently seeking an Inventory Planner to join our team. At Alfa Laval, we are committed to overcoming challenges and driving success for our customers, employees, and the environment. We believe in the power of curiosity to ignite innovation and progress
   

  

**About The Job**
 You will be a crucial part of our Global Spare Parts Planning Team under Alfa Laval's Parts Distribution and Logistics (PDL) division. We are seeking an experienced Inventory Planner to help optimize our global distribution network and ensure high service levels for our customers.
   

  

 At Alfa Laval, we are dedicated to enhancing the performance of our customers' processes, striving for sustainable outcomes.
   

  

 We offer an engaging and challenging position within an international, open, and collaborative environment. At Alfa Laval, we support each other’s development and work together to create value for our customers. Your contributions will have a genuine impact on a sustainable future and will play a crucial role in Alfa Laval’s ongoing success.
   

  

**Some Key Responsibilities Will Be To**
* Collaborating with Business Units and Distribution Centers to facilitate end-to-end supply planning, optimizing stock levels while maintaining high service levels for customers.
* Run item classification and Inventory optimization processes.
* Proactively assessing and analyzing supply chain constraints, inventory levels and sustainability impacts to support informed business decisions.
* Drive continuous improvement activities to optimize inventory across the global network of Distribution centers.
* Providing support and analysis to internal stakeholders regarding supply chain planning, master data, and supply chain setup.
* Participating in process improvement initiatives, supply chain projects, and system implementations.
* You will be part of the team in either Tumba or Lund office and reports to the PDL Supply Chain Manager, with the flexibility to occasionally work from home. In addition, expect about 20-30 travel days per year.


**About You**
 To succeed in this role, you quickly and aptly assess the potential consequences of different actions related to any situation or task, and you can draw valid conclusions from large amounts of complex information. As a strong team player, you facilitate collaboration between others to achieve common goals.
   

  

 You Have a Bachelors Or Master Of Science Degree In Logistics, Supply Chain Management, Or a Related Field, With Minimum Three Years Of Previous Experience And Expertise In The Following Areas
   

  

* Supply chain, logistics, and/or inventory planning, preferably within the spare parts business.
* Experience in managing/participating in the Sales and Operations Planning (S&OP) process is advantageous.
* Project management skills or knowledge of Lean Six Sigma principles.
* Familiarity with platforms such as Blue Yonder Luminate, Movex, and/or Microsoft Dynamics(D365) is an advantage.
* Experience in using Power BI or similar Business Intelligence platforms.


 This position requires fluency in Swedish and English and you will be based in our Flemingsberg office in Stockholm
   

  

**What You Know**
 We believe that you have previous experience and expertise in the areas such as supply chain, logistics, and/or inventory planning, preferably within the spare parts business. You have experience in managing/participating in the Sales and Operations Planning (S&OP) process is advantageous. Your proficiency in statistical analysis, forecasting models, and predictive analytics tools are exceptional, as well as your project management skills and knowledge of Lean Six Sigma principles. As an advantage, we value your familiarity with platforms such as Blue Yonder Luminate, Movex M3, and/or Microsoft Dynamics(D365), Power BI. You should possess a university degree in logistics, supply chain management, or a related field and be fluent in English.
   

  

**Who You Are**
 Just like us, you value customer-focused work and excel at networking and building relationships within the organization. You have a strong analytical skill and the ability to simplify complex concepts. You have a successful and open-minded way of leading and influencing style. Teamwork is your thing, but so it is to be independent and self-driven.
   

  

**What We Offer**
 We provide an engaging and challenging position in an international, open, and collaborative environment. Here, we support each other’s development and work together to create value for our customers. Your work will have a genuine impact on a sustainable future and contribute to Alfa Laval’s ongoing success.
   

  

**For Further Information Please Contact**
 Jonas Wikbladh, Supply chain planning Manager, PDL, jonas.wikbladh@alfalaval.com
   

  

 Divya Sharma, Talent Acquisition Partner, divya.sharma@alfalaval.com
   

  

**For Union Information, Please Contact**
 Anders Jansson anders.jansson@alfalaval.com Unionen
   

  

 Kenneth Widerström kenneth.widerstrom@alfalaval.com Ledarna
   

  

 Linda Oxel Linda.Oxel@alfalaval.com Akademikerna
   

  

**Assessment practicalities**
 We care about diversity, inclusion, and equity in our recruitment processes. We also believe behavioral traits can provide important insights into a candidate's fit to a role. To help us achieve this, we apply Pymetrics assessments, and upon application you will be invited to play the assessment games.
   

  

 Applications will be reviewed continuously as they come, so please send your as soon as possible and no later than May 30th, 2025
   

  

 Applications sent directly via email will be disregarded without notice due to GDPR.
   

  

 We are looking forward to your application.

title: Public Cloud Sales lead - Tietoevry Tech Services (m/f/d)
description:
**You may apply to Tietoevry by selecting Apply and fill your application details to the form. You may also Apply by using LinkedIn and populate details to your application from your LinkedIn profile.**
 Are you passionate about advisory led sales & demand generation and want to join one of the largest tech companies in the Nordics? Don’t look further - then this is the role for you!
   

  

 We are growing and now looking for the next star in our team. You will have a pivotal role in growing the public cloud business in Sweden across multiple segments and industries.
   

  

**About the Role:**
 We are strategically expanding our Public Cloud business in Sweden and are looking for a dynamic Sales Lead to drive this growth. At Tietoevry Tech Services we are deeply committed to guiding our customers through their Public Cloud journeys, focusing on strategic decisions that deliver measurable, long-term impact on their top and bottom lines.
   

  

 As a Public Cloud Sales Lead, you will be instrumental in initiating and leading Cloud Enablement discussions with clients, moving beyond traditional 'Lift & Shift' to create demand for transformative projects. Leveraging our extensive capabilities in Data Management, AI, GenAI, Intelligent Automation, Integration & API Management, Realtime Data Streaming, Software Development, and more, you will help customers unlock the full value of the cloud to drive their business objectives and enterprise-level modernization. If you are passionate about advisory-led sales and see the cloud as a catalyst for true business transformation, we encourage you to read on.
   

  

**When joining Tietoevry Tech Services as a Sales Lead for Public Cloud you will:**
* Serve as a trusted advisor and partner to both new and existing customers.
* Develop and execute strategic and tactical sales plans to acquire new logos, collaborating closely with technical experts, architects, and other sales executives.
* Drive demand generation through targeted sales processes and active networking with key stakeholders to build new relationships.
* Work within a highly collaborative and non-hierarchical team culture.
* Partner with cross-functional teams to develop compelling, advisory-led sales narratives focused on Cloud Enablement, Cloud Economics, and Enterprise Modernization.


**We Would Like You To Have The Following Skills**
* Minimum of 5 years of proven experience in complex solution sales and advisory-led sales at the CxO level, specifically within the cloud domain.
* Demonstrated ability to develop thought leadership and compelling sales narratives for Public Cloud and related digital capabilities (e.g., Data & AI, Automation).
* Excellent communication and negotiation skills in both Swedish and English (verbal and written).
* Proven track record of consistently achieving and exceeding sales targets.
* Strong initiative, drive, and a passion for making a significant impact.


 Preferred:
   

  

* A university degree or equivalent educational background.
* Relevant industry knowledge in one or more of the following sectors: Public Sector, Retail, Manufacturing (Process or Discreet), Heavy Industry, Banking, or Insurance.


**We offer**
 We offer you an opportunity to create the future of a growing, fast-developing, and important sector. We believe that our organizational culture is an important part of enabling you to be successful. We provide a flexible hybrid work model as part of our culture and way of working. Finally, we also believe in curiosity and learning as a lifestyle where you need to unlearn and relearn every day as new possibilities emerge.
   

  

**Did we get you inspired?**
 We look forward to your application!
   

  

 Please attach your
 **CV and application** 
 and we will reach out to you. Interviews will be held on a continuous basis, so we encourage you to apply today.
   

  

**About Tietoevry Tech Services**
 Tietoevry Tech Services is thrilled to embark on an exciting journey as a standalone company during 2025 . This change opens up new possibilities, challenges, and growth opportunities for our company and our employees. We are looking for talented people who want to join us on this exciting journey and help shape the digital landscape in the Nordics.
   

  

 At Tietoevry Tech Services, we specialize in driving enterprise-wide digital transformation. Our expertise lies in helping Nordic societies and businesses by modernizing and developing processes, applications, and infrastructure, providing reliable, secure, and efficient IT services. Under the new ownership, we'll continue to shape the future of technology in the Nordics together with our customers.
   

  

 We invite you to be a key part of our global Tech Services Team of 7000+ colleagues as we build our future as a standalone company. At Tietoevry Tech Services, collaboration, talent appreciation, and employee growth are at the core of our values.
   

  

 At Tietoevry, we believe in the power of diversity, equity, and inclusion. We encourage applicants of all backgrounds, genders (m/f/d), and walks of life to join our team, as we believe that this fosters an inspiring workplace and fuels innovation. Our commitment to openness, trust, and diversity is at the heart of our mission to create digital futures that benefit businesses, societies, and humanity. Diversity, equity and inclusion (tietoevry.com)

title: Veralto Enterprise System (VES) Commercial Leader
description:
Are you…
   

  

 Passionate about driving commercial success in a global, diverse environment?
   

  

 Are you process oriented as well as people oriented?
   

  

 Looking to collaborate with a supportive and dynamic team dedicated to growth?
   

  

 If so, read on!
   

  

**About Us Esko, a Veralto company, is a leading global provider of integrated software and hardware solutions that accelerate the go-to-market process for packaged goods. We empower teams to manage packaging design and print processes efficiently, enabling brand owners, retailers, and manufacturers to innovate and connect seamlessly. Our commitment to sustainability and innovation makes us a unique player in the packaging industry.**
 This position can be remote or based in a hybrid model at our Ghent, Belgium office.
   

  

**Role Overview**
 As the Commercial VES Leader, you will play a crucial role achieving our commercial objectives of the software business unit by leveraging our Veralto Enterprise System (VES). The Veralto Enterprise System is Veralto's Differentiated System of Continuous Improvement and the Culture that makes it work.
   

  

 Your experience in sales, customer success or other commercial roles will be instrumental in driving business growth and maximizing the value of our VES tools across the organization. You will act as a trusted business partner, collaborating with the Esko leadership team as well as associates from various departments to foster a culture of continuous improvement and commercial excellence.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Support and enable acceleration of core growth across Esko using the VES Commercial Engine and its associated tools together with the fundamental VES toolset
* Establish and maintain strong relationships with functional and regional leaders to promote VES initiatives that align with commercial goals.
* Support M&A integrations by installing the VES culture and tools.
* Prioritize and align the Kaizen Funnel with key business initiatives, coaching and guiding teams to achieve commercial objectives. Drive sustainment of the kaizens through selecting the right sustainment metrics and coaching the sustainment activities.
* Install/improve/sustain funnel management and value selling
* Set up and support growth rooms where DM (daily management) is used to drive certain strategic growth objectives.
* The Commercial team (Sales, Customer Success, Service, Marketing and Deployment) will be the primary focus of this role, but will also be asked to support other functions in Brands and Supplier BU.
* Promote the intentional use of VES Fundamentals with a commercial focus, ensuring that teams understand the impact on business outcomes.
* Drive continuous improvement in the priority areas above through PSP (problem solving process), DM (daily management) and Kaizen work.
* Lead workshops and training sessions to enhance VES skills, ensuring commercial teams are equipped to leverage these tools effectively.
* Assist leadership in the development of a VES roadmap based on strategic priorities and the VES assessment results.


**Profile**
* Master’s degree in Business Administration, Management, or a related field.
* Minimum 10 years of experience in a commercial role within a software environment, with a proven track record in sales, customer success, business development, or continuous improvement.
* Strong understanding of continuous improvement methodologies (Kaizen, 5S, VSM, Problem Solving) or VES tools, with an emphasis on their application in commercial settings.
* Strategic thinker with robust business acumen, capable of providing insights that drive commercial success.
* Exceptional relationship-building and motivational leadership skills, with the ability to influence and engage stakeholders at all levels.
* Excellent facilitation and training skills, with experience in leading cross-functional workshops.
* Process-oriented but adaptable, thriving in a transforming organization.
* Confident in navigating organizational change in pursuit of commercial goals.
* Fluent in spoken and written English.


 Why Join Us? At Esko, a Veralto Company, we value diversity and innovation. Join us to experience a career journey like no other—where your ideas can shape the future of the packaging industry. You will be part of a team that creates unique technology solutions, drives commercial success, and contributes to a sustainable world.
   

  

 Esko is proud to be a leader in Product Quality & Innovation within Veralto (NYSE: VLTO). Together, we are creating a world where everyone has access to clean water, safe food, and trusted essential goods. Join us in safeguarding the world's most vital resources and making a meaningful impact.
   

  

 Application Process If you are ready to elevate your career in a commercially-focused role where innovation and teamwork thrive, we encourage you to apply. We embrace diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.
   

  

 At Veralto, we value diversity and the existence of similarities and differences, both visible and not, found in our workforce, workplace and throughout the markets we serve. Our associates, customers and shareholders contribute unique and different perspectives as a result of these diverse attributes.
   

  

 If you’ve ever wondered what’s within you, there’s no better time to find out.
   

  

**Unsolicited Assistance**
 We do not accept unsolicited assistance from any headhunters or recruitment firms for any of our job openings. All resumes or profiles submitted by search firms to any employee at any of the Veralto companies, in any form without a valid, signed search agreement in place for the specific position, approved by Talent Acquisition, will be deemed the sole property of Veralto and its companies. No fee will be paid in the event the candidate is hired by Veralto and its companies because of the unsolicited referral.

title: Global Process Expert at the heart of the action | SEB, Stockholm
description:
Are you passionate about driving change and improving processes? Do you thrive in a collaborative and international environment where you can create real business value for our largest corporate customers? If so, SEB has an exciting opportunity for you!
   

  

 Since our founding in 1856, SEB has been a leader in building strong customer relationships and driving sustainable growth. As one of Northern Europe’s top financial service groups, we empower our employees to grow, take responsibility, and make an impact. Welcome to SEB!
   

  

**About The Role**
 As a part of the SEB Group, we at Business Services provide world-class financial services to support SEB on the journey of becoming the leader in efficiency and innovation. Our dedicated team of over 1,700 employees is focused on driving business development and growth. If you want to step up and be part of an engaging environment where you can turn your everyday actions into global results, this is where you get to shine, at the heart of the action.
   

  

 As a global process expert in structured and syndicated loans your will focus be on driving innovation and change. You have an ability to work independently with tasks that are not always pre-defined. As a process expert you are a member of the departments development team, currently two process experts, three system configurators and one business analyst. This position is based in Arenastaden, Stockholm Solna.
   

  

 In our Structured Loans department, with services in both Stockholm and Vilnius, we are handling complex loans for our largest corporate customers.
   

  

**In Addition, The Role Will Also Include**
* Lead and support key change initiatives
* Analyse and implement new requirements
* Collaborate with product specialists and cross-functional teams
* Secure implementation of and adherence to the process framework
* Drive process efficiency and improve workflows
* Represent SEB in joint banking activities
* Build and maintain end-to-end process knowledge


**To Thrive In This Role, We Believe You Have**
* A strategic and proactive problem solver who excels in change management and process optimisation.
* Experience in non-financial risk management
* Strong communication and collaboration skills
* An analytical mindset with a solution-oriented approach
* Familiarity with both business and technical aspects
* Proficiency in English, both written and spoken
* Preferable expertise in process mapping and efficiency improvements
* Preferable experience in leading initiatives of varying scale
* Preferable knowledge of technical solutions in process optimisation
* It is an advantage if you have worked with processes or projects within the financial sector and/or large organizations.


**What We Offer**
* Access to extensive training and development programmes
* A healthy work-life balance in an inclusive, welcoming culture
* Competitive compensation and access to SEB’s staff banking benefits, including health insurance and pension savings
* International career opportunities and exposure to a global working environment
* A meaningful role with opportunities to drive impactful change


**Do you want to be a part of SEB?**
 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected, and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.
   

  

 Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today via the link in this ad, but no later than 11th of May. If you have questions about the position, please contact recruiting manager Mimmie Hedman, Global Process Manager via email: mimmie.hedman@seb.se, but we will not process applications via email.
   

  

 Please be aware that our final candidates undergo background checks, a process that includes for example identity control, verification of qualifications, credit checks, company engagements and criminal records checks. In some cases, we also apply random drug checks.
   

  

**Learn more about working at SEB** 
 on our Career website or through our Career podcasts:
   

  

**https://sebgroup.com/career**
**https://bit.ly/SEBcareer**

title: Data engineer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.
   

  

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*
**Job Description**
* Design and implement scalable data pipelines and ETL processes.
* Collaborate with data analysts and scientists to understand data requirements and deliver working solutions for production.
* Ensure data quality and integrity
* Optimize data storage and retrieval for performance and cost-efficiency.
* Provide technical expertise and support to team members and stakeholders.


**Your Profile (Must-have Requirements)**
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
* Experience working with both data engineering and data science
* Proficiency in SQL, Python, and data warehousing solutions.
* Experience with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud).
* Skills and experience in working with time-series data and time-series databases such as influxDB or Timebase
* Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
* Knowledge of machine learning algorithms and frameworks.
* Skills in developing models to forecast future trends based on historical data.
* Knowledge of data privacy and security regulations.
* Basic understanding of web applications and REST APIs


**Application deadline:** 
 16-05-2025
   

  

**About Us**
 We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.
   

  

 Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?
   

  

 We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.
   

  

 🌟 A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.
   

  

 🚗 Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.
   

  

 💼 Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.
   

  

 🌴 Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?
   

  

 🏥 Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.
   

  

 📚 Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.
   

  

 🕑 Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?
   

  

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: DevOps konsult till spännande uppdrag!
description:
Proacts konsultteam i Stockholm söker nu förstärkning i form av en DevOps resurs för att bygga upp och utveckla leveransen till en av våra största kunder. Trivs du med att träffa nya människor och utforska olika miljöer samtidigt som du får stora utvecklingsmöjligheter. Ta chansen nu och sök till oss och att få chansen att jobba tillsammans i ett fantastiskt team som driver och utvecklar en leverans åt ett av Sveriges största företag inom IT och kommunikation.
   

  

**Om rollen**
 På det här uppdraget kommer du få möjlighet att arbeta med en bredd av olika uppgifter. Din roll blir central i att hjälpa kunden vidare i deras arbete med lagringslösningar och automation. Flexibel arbetsplats tillämpas så du behöver inte vara stationerad i Stockholm.
   

  

**Vad vi söker hos dig**
 Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga kompetenser, som är viktiga för att du ska trivas hos oss och vi med dig. Du är flexibel och trivs med att dela med dig av din kompetens och att samarbeta med andra. Du uppskattar möjligheten att arbeta ute hos kund och jobba i en varierande vardag. Du är självgående och tar ansvar för dina uppgifter, strukturerar och prioriterar ditt arbete och driver dina processer framåt. Du har en god problemlösningsförmåga och arbetar bra med komplexa frågor.
   

  

 För att lyckas i rollen hos vår kund behöver du kunskap inom dessa områden.
   

  

**Pythonutveckling**
* Expertis inom Python-skriptning och automation.
* Erfarenhet av att utveckla Python-baserade automationsramverk.


**Lagringsautomation**
* Kunskap om storage.
* Erfarenhet av storage, provisionering och automationsarbetsflöden.


**CI/CD-pipelines**
* Praktisk erfarenhet av CI/CD-pipelines, specifikt GitLab CI/CD.
* Sätta upp och underhålla automatiserade pipelines för koddistribution, testning och infrastruktur.


**DevOps-principer**
* Stark förståelse för DevOps-principer, inklusive kontinuerlig integration, kontinuerlig distribution och infrastruktur som kod.
* Erfarenhet av att automatisera provisionering och distribution av infrastruktur.


**Versionshantering**
* Skicklighet i Git och GitLab-arbetsflöden (grenning, merge requests, versionshantering).


**Testning & Automation**
* Erfarenhet av att skriva automatiserade tester (enhetstester, integrationstester) för Python-baserade projekt.
* Bekantskap med automationverktyg och ramverk för testning och distribution.


**Linuxmiljö**
* Bekväm med att arbeta i en Linux-baserad miljö.
* Erfarenhet av skal-skriptning, hantering av Linux-servrar och att automatisera uppgifter i Linux.


**Teamarbete**
* Bekant med Agile- eller Scrum-arbetsflöden.


**Dina arbetsuppgifter inkluderar**
* Design, implementation, felsökning, förvaltning och utveckling av våra kunders datamiljöer och dess IT-infrastruktur
* Delta i projekt som teknisk rådgivare och utförare samt leverera dokumentation enligt krav
* Agera teknisk specialist och rådgivare både internt och externt inom dina kompetensområden
* Löpande underhållsarbete och hälsocheckar
* Proact stöttar din utveckling och uppmuntrar dig till att löpande utveckla din kompetens genom utbildning och certifieringar.


 Du blir en del av ett team av skickliga konsulter med olika specialiseringar inom lagring, backup och IT-säkerhet. Vi har en positiv energi och ett öppet arbetsklimat där vi gärna delar med oss av våra erfarenheter.
   

  

**Om oss**
 Vi värdesätter dig för den du är. Hos oss tas dina individuella förmågor, erfarenheter och möjligheter tillvara. Du blir en del av en härlig arbetsmiljö där vi tar hand om varandra och våra kunder på bästa sätt. Med fokus på utveckling, laganda och professionalism strävar vi efter att skapa nöjdhet både personligen och hos våra kunder.
   

  

 Proact är Europas ledande specialist inom datacenter och molntjänster. Genom att leverera flexibla, tillgängliga och säkra IT-tjänster skapar Proact verksamhetsnytta som hjälper företag och myndigheter att minska risken och sänka kostnaderna. Samtidigt ökar rörligheten, produktiviteten och effektiviteten. Vi har över 1200 anställda i 14 länder i Europa och USA.
   

  

 Proact grundades 1994 och moderbolaget Proact IT Group AB (publ) är noterat på Nasdaq Stockholm sedan 1999.
   

  

 Det här är en genuint varm och öppen arbetsplats, där vi skrattar mycket och har kul på jobbet.
   

  

 Är du intresserad? Hör av dig!

title: Cloud Security-arkitekt
company_industry: Software Development, IT Services and IT Consulting, and Business Consulting and Services
description:
**Jobbeskrivning**
**Vill du vara med och leda utvecklingen av säkerhetslösningar i molnet?**
 Sopra Steria, Nordens ledande aktör inom digital transformation, söker nu en erfaren Cloud Security-arkitekt som vill vara med och stärka våra kunders digitala trygghet. Vi har utsetts till ett karriärföretag och rankats som en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser 2024 av Great Place to Work.
   

  

 I denna strategiska roll kommer du att spela en avgörande roll i leveransen av avancerade och innovativa molnbaserade lösningar till våra kunder. Du blir en nyckelperson i att säkerställa att våra kunders digitala arbetsplatser och tjänster inte bara är moderna och funktionella, utan också robusta och säkra inför framtidens utmaningar.
   

  

**Om rollen:**
 Som Cloud Security-arkitekt på Sopra Steria kommer du att ansvara för att designa, implementera och utveckla säkra molnarkitekturer inom Microsofts ekosystem. Med djupgående expertis inom säkerhetslösningar för Azure och Microsoft 365 kommer du att arbeta proaktivt och konsultativt med våra kunder för att bygga framtidssäkra lösningar som skyddar deras data, applikationer och användare.
   

  

**Exempel på ansvarsområden:**
* Utveckling och implementering av säkerhetsstrategier och arkitekturer baserade på Microsofts ramverk
* Utföra säkerhetsbedömningar och riskanalyser för att identifiera och åtgärda potentiella säkerhetshot
* Hantering av incidenter och analys av säkerhetsdata med hjälp av verktyg som Microsoft Sentinel och Defender XDR
* Design och införande av Zero Trust-modeller samt konfiguration av säker molninfrastruktur, klienter och identiteter
* Rådgivning och utbildning för att stärka kunders säkerhetsmedvetenhet och efterlevnad av standarder


**Vem är du?**
 Vi söker dig som är en senior teknisk expert med en dokumenterad förmåga att bygga förtroende hos kunder och som drivs av att skapa värde genom säkerhet i molnet. Du är en analytisk och strategiskt tänkande person som kan identifiera risker och omsätta komplexa utmaningar till konkreta lösningar.
   

  

**Kvalifikationer:**
* Minst 5–8 års erfarenhet inom IT-säkerhet, molnarkitektur och Microsofts ekosystem.
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av Microsoft Azure, Microsoft 365 och Defender-sviten.
* Gedigen kunskap om SIEM-verktyg som Microsoft Sentinel.
* Erfarenhet av Identity and Access Management (IAM) och Zero Trust-arkitekturer.
* Kompetens inom scriptning och automation (t.ex. PowerShell, KQL, Bicep, Terraform).
* Certifieringar som Azure Security Engineer Associate och Cybersecurity Architect Expert, CISSP, CCSP eller motsvarande är starkt meriterande.


 Personliga egenskaper:
   

  

* Strukturerad och metodisk med ett tydligt säkerhetsfokus.
* Självständig och initiativrik med en problemlösande attityd.
* Kommunikativ och pedagogisk – du har förmågan att förklara säkerhetslösningar för både tekniska och icke-tekniska målgrupper.


**Vad Sopra Steria erbjuder dig:**
 På Sopra Steria blir du en del av en organisation som prioriterar innovation, kompetensutveckling och samarbete. Vi erbjuder en dynamisk arbetsmiljö med några av marknadens mest spännande projekt inom digital transformation. Genom certifieringar och vidareutbildningar får du möjlighet att fördjupa din expertis inom produkter och tjänster relevanta för din roll.
   

  

 Vi är stolta över vår kultur som bygger på öppenhet, samarbete och möjligheten att påverka. Som anställd hos oss erbjuds du flexibla arbetsförhållanden, möjlighet till distansarbete och en stark gemenskap i en global organisation med över 60 000 medarbetare i mer än 30 länder.
   

  

**Ansökan:**
 Låter detta som en roll för dig? Skicka in din ansökan och CV redan idag! Har du frågor om tjänsten, kontakta rekryteringsansvarig Teodor Nellvik (teodor.nellvik@soprasteria.com).
   

  

 På Sopra Steria ställer vi höga krav på både kompetens och säkerhetsmedvetenhet hos våra medarbetare. Innan en eventuell anställning kommer du därför att genomgå en bakgrundskontroll, och vid intervju behöver du kunna uppvisa giltig legitimation.
   

  

**Viktig information:**
 Sopra Steria accepterar endast ansökningar från kandidater eller rekryteringsföretag med giltiga avtal. Vi tar inte ansvar för avgifter kopplade till CV:n skickade utan överenskommelse.
   

  

 To all recruitment agencies without a base agreement: Sopra Steria does not accept resumes from agencies with whom we do not have an agreement. Please do not forward resumes to our jobs alias, Sopra Steria employees or any other company location. Sopra Steria is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes.
   

  

**Ytterligare information**
 Sopra Steria är ett ledande internationellt konsultbolag inom digital transformation. Vi bygger samhället genom designdriven innovation, teknisk utveckling med kunskap om marknadens ledande plattformar och driftlösningar (managed services). Med modern teknologi och en gedigen affärsförståelse är vi en helhetspartner för våra kunder och deras digitala transformationsresa. Enligt Great Place To Work är vi en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser, vi har tilldelats utmärkelsen Karriärföretag flera år i rad och Gartner har listat oss som ett topp 5 bolag inom digital transformation.

title: Software Engineers to Zalando
description:
**About The Company And The Role**
 We are looking for two Software Engineers to join Zalando, an international e-commerce company that is shaping the future of retail. This company provides a platform that serves millions of customers worldwide and is now expanding its engineering team to continue delivering innovative solutions. Here, you’ll have the chance to work with technologies such as Java, Kotlin, AWS, PostgreSQL, and Elasticsearch, all while collaborating with passionate teams focused on driving innovation.
   

  

 In the role of Software Engineer, you’ll develop and operate large-scale systems that ensure timely and accurate order fulfillment. Your primary focus will be to build backend applications that handle high volumes of data and deliver seamless experiences for customers and partners.
   

  

 At Zalando, you’ll be part of a culture that values collaboration, creativity, and continuous learning. This role offers you the chance to contribute to an innovative, customer-centric organization that is reshaping the future of online retail.
   

  

**Your Responsibilities Will Include**
* Developing and maintaining high-performance, low-latency systems for data streaming and processing.
* Collaborating with cross-functional teams to design, implement, and scale solutions for fulfillment and customer experience.
* Taking ownership of applications, managing them from development through deployment and monitoring.
* Innovating and finding solutions to scale the platform in an increasingly complex ecosystem.
* Actively contributing to the development of new features and improvements.


 You’ll contribute to Zalando’s success by ensuring the systems you build directly enhance the customer experience. As a Software Engineer, you’ll be challenged by the complexity of building distributed systems at scale and will have the opportunity to collaborate across teams and countries.
   

  

**We Believe You Have**
* A relevant degree in Computer Science or a related field.
* 3-6 years of professional experience in software engineering.
* Solid experience with Java or Kotlin and building APIs.
* Familiarity with databases (e.g., PostgreSQL) and event-driven architectures.
* Some experience or interest in AWS, Kubernetes, and Elasticsearch.
* A passion for problem-solving and building scalable solutions.
* Strong communication skills in English (written and spoken).


**It’s a Bonus If You Have**
* Experience with cloud technologies (AWS, Kubernetes) and distributed systems.
* Knowledge of Kafka or similar messaging systems.
* Experience working with large-scale, high-availability systems.


 We are looking for candidates who are proactive, innovative, and motivated to work in a fast-paced, collaborative environment.
   

  

 Other information
   

  

 Start date: As soon as possible
   

  

 Scope: Full-time position (100%)
   

  

 Location: Stockholm.
   

  

 Selection process: We apply continuous selection, which means the position may be filled before the application deadline.
   

  

 If you have any questions about the role or the recruitment process, feel free to contact the responsible recruiter Ronja Bergman on ronja.bergman@techtalents.se
   

  

 Does this sound like the position for you? We look forward to hearing from you – warmly welcome with your application!
   

  

 In this recruitment, Zalando is collaborating with Tech Talents, and we direct applications to Tech Talents.

title: Cloud Specialist
company_industry: Embedded Software Products, Think Tanks, and Technology, Information and Internet
description:
**Looking for a place where you can challenge yourself, build serious tech and have a good time doing it?**
 At Redeploy, we design, build, scale and maintain modern solutions across Cloud, Data and AI, helping ambitious companies across the Nordics transform how they work with technology. As a trusted partner to Microsoft, AWS and Databricks, we deliver platforms that are built for impact and built to last.
   

  

 What sets us apart is the way we work. Curiosity runs deep here, as does the drive to keep learning and sharing. You’ll join a team that values ownership, collaboration and high technical standards, and where people genuinely care about doing things well. For our clients. And for each other.
   

  

**What The Role Is About**
 As a Cloud Specialist at Redeploy, you’ll work as a consultant in projects where infrastructure, automation and scalability are in focus. You’ll help clients modernize their cloud environments in Azure or AWS – whether that means a large-scale migration, a new platform build or targeted optimization.
   

  

 The projects vary, but the role is always hands-on and solution-oriented. You’ll work closely with developers, architects and stakeholders to design and implement smart, cloud-native infrastructure. You’ll have plenty of ownership, but never on your own. Here, you’re part of a strong internal community where knowledge-sharing and support are part of everyday life.
   

  

 See some examples of cases we’ve worked with here.
   

  

**What You’ll Grow Into**
 Cloud is a big space - and at Redeploy, there’s room to explore where you want to go. You might want to deepen your skills in infrastructure-as-code or specialize in areas like security, Kubernetes or FinOps. Or maybe you’re more curious about cloud architecture or moving closer to the business side. Whatever direction you’re interested in, there are opportunities to shape your path.
   

  

 You’ll be part of a skilled cloud community where learning happens every day - through collaboration, knowledge-sharing and hands-on experience. With strong partnerships with Microsoft and AWS, and a steady flow of events and meetups (both our own and others), we stay sharp and up to date together.
   

  

**What We’re Looking For**
 You enjoy solving complex challenges, building scalable infrastructure and seeing the real impact of your work. Maybe you’ve worked as a consultant before, or maybe you’re just drawn to the mix of tech, people and problem-solving. Either way, you value variety and want to work closely with both clients and colleagues.
   

  

 To succeed here, you don’t just need strong technical skills - you need the mindset that comes with being a great consultant. Clear communication, curiosity and the confidence to both challenge and be challenged go a long way. And like us, you care about doing things well, together.
   

  

**What Experiences You Bring**
* Strong experience working with cloud infrastructure and services in Azure, AWS or both
* Strong knowledge of core infrastructure technologies like networking, virtualization and containerization
* Strong experience with IaC tools such as Terraform, Bicep, CDK, Ansible or CloudFormation
* Experience with Git and setting up CI/CD pipelines
* A structured and analytical approach to problem-solving
* Curiosity and willingness to learn and share knowledge with others
* Strong communication skills in Swedish and English


 Experience with Kubernetes, microservices, FinOps or cloud governance frameworks is a plus.
   

  

**Curious to learn more before applying?** 
 Have a look around our career site to explore our culture, people and way of working. And if you have any questions, feel free to reach out to our Talent Acquisition Manager, Francisca Andersson.
   

  

*Cloud Platforming is one of our core capabilities, and we recruit for this role on an ongoing basis. While our hiring pace may vary over time,* 
 we’re always happy to connect with great people.

title: CISO – För dig som vill ta nästa steg i säkerhetskarriären
description:
**Är du redo att växa i en strategisk roll? Vi söker vår nästa CISO-konsult** 





 Vill du kombinera säkerhetsuppdrag ute hos kund med att forma BT Compliance interna säkerhetsarbete? Vi söker nu en driven informationssäkerhetskonsult med några års erfarenhet som är redo att ta ett bredare ansvar och utvecklas i rollen som Chief Information Security Officer (CISO) – både internt och i externa uppdrag.
 





 Det här är en roll för dig som vill kliva upp ett steg i karriären och få möjlighet att ta ledarroll i säkerhetsarbetet, utan att behöva ha 10 års erfarenhet i bagaget. Du kommer att få stöd från erfarna kollegor och vara en viktig del i hur vi utvecklar vår säkerhetskompetens, både för kund och internt.
 




  
 



**Om Rollen** 





 ·       Bidra till utveckling och genomförande av säkerhetsstrategier hos kund
 





 ·       Stötta kundorganisationer i arbete med riskhantering, styrdokument och regelefterlevnad
 





 ·       Vara kontaktperson för säkerhetsfrågor och ge rådgivning till kundens ledning och IT
 





 ·       Leda eller samordna säkerhetsrelaterade projekt och incidentprocesser
 





 ·       Vara en del av BT Compliance säkerhetsledning internt, tillsammans med andra konsulter.
 





  
 




**Om dig** 





 ·       Cirka 3–5 års erfarenhet av arbete med informations- eller IT-säkerhet
 





 ·       Någon vana av att arbeta i kunduppdrag eller en vilja att ta steget in i konsultrollen
 





 ·       God förståelse för regelverk som NIS2, ISO 27001 och GDPR
 





 ·       Förmåga att uttrycka dig väl i både tal och skrift – svenska och engelska
 





 ·       Nyfikenhet, ansvarskänsla och en vilja att utvecklas i en roll med större Ansvar
 





 ·       Då vi arbetar med säkerhet är det viktigt att du är Svensk medborgare och kan genomgå en säkerhetskontroll.
 





 ·       Uttrycka dig väl på både Svenska och Engelska i tal och skrift
 





  
 




**Meriterande** 

 :
 





 ·       Certifieringar såsom CISSP, CISM, ISO 27001 eller liknande
 





 ·       Erfarenhet från offentlig sektor eller samhällskritiska verksamheter
 





 ·       Tidigare deltagande i säkerhetsprojekt, revisioner eller incidenthantering
 




  
 



  
 



**Vi på BT Compliance erbjuder** 




  
 



 BT Compliance erbjuder en möjlighet att vara med på resan av ett växande bolag där dina idéer och kompetens värdesätts högt. Du får vara del av ett härligt gäng som har en inkluderande och samarbetsvänlig arbetsmiljö. Dessutom erbjuder BT Compliance ett flertal attraktiva och flexibla förmåner för våra konsulter. Lockas du av fördelarna med ett mindre konsultbolag och vill veta mer vad BT Compliance kan erbjuda, är du varmt välkommen att höra av dig till oss.
 



  
 



  
 



**Ansökningsprocessen** 




  
 



 Vi hanterar ansökningar, intervjuer och urval löpande vilket innebär att tjänsten kan tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum. Ditt driv, intresse och engagemang är viktigast för oss, så sök gärna även om du inte uppfyller alla önskvärda krav och ta chansen att bli en del av BT Compliance redan idag.
 



  
 



 Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!

title: Senior Tester
job_function: Engineering, Information Technology, and Quality Assurance
company_industry: Software Development, IT Services and IT Consulting, and Engineering Services
description:
Are you a meticulous Senior Tester with a passion for retail technology and a strong understanding of QA testing?
 



  





**💰Up to $35 per hour** 




**🌎 Stockholm, Sweden (On-Site)** 




 ☑️
 **Full-time** 




**🕦 B2B contract** 




  





 We are looking for a Test Analyst to join our team in Stockholm and play a key role in modernizing retail systems that integrate payment, point of sale, back-office, and edge computing technologies. Apply now and help shape the future of retail technology!
 



  





**Requirements:** 



* Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or related field, or relevant work experience.
* 3+ years of QA testing experience, specifically with retail technology (POS, Payment, Back Office, etc.).
* Experience with Waterfall, Agile, and SAFe Agile frameworks.
* High attention to detail and solid analytical skills.
* Strong understanding of IT testing principles and best practices.
* Proficiency in using Atlassian tools (Jira, Confluence).
* Comfortable working with MS Office Suite (Project, Visio, Word, Excel).
* Proven track record of working on global, cross-functional, enterprise-level retail technology projects.
* Experience working with third-party onshore and offshore development partners.
* Knowledge of SDLC, application integration principles, and methods.
* Outstanding written and verbal communication skills in English.



  





**Nice to Have:** 



* Experience with Test Automation and knowledge of programming languages.
* Familiarity with payment systems, POS integrations, and back-office solutions.



  





**Responsibilities:** 



* Execute Manual, Systems Integration, End-to-End, Regression, and Smoke Testing on retail technology equipment in a physical lab environment.
* Create and maintain test cases and scripts based on communicated requirements.
* Document and maintain test results in Jira and other test management tools (Test Rail, Xray, etc.).
* Maintain test data to support testing of varying scenarios.
* Troubleshoot issues and demonstrate system functionality as part of root cause analysis.
* Report concise test results and system functionality to cross-functional teams.
* Track defects and assist in troubleshooting errors using log files and other artifacts.
* Ensure adherence to testing SLA compliance.
* Collaborate with Business and Development teams to drive defect resolution.

title: Tekniska affärsutvecklare
description:
Tekniska affärsutvecklare till Stockholm
   

  

 Subec är ett design- och ingenjörsföretag med huvudfokus att betjäna en världsomspännande tråd-, kabel-, slang- och plastindustri med utrustning, maskiner och skräddarsydda lösningar.
   

  

**Vi erbjuder**
 Som teknisk affärsutvecklare hos oss blir du en del av en liten organisation med korta beslutsvägar där du blir en viktig del av utvecklingen. Vi är ett trevligt gäng som jobbar nära varandra.
   

  

 Som teknisk affärsutvecklare får du möjlighet att arbeta med kunder i bland annat Tyskland, Österrike, Schweiz, USA, Frankrike och Italien. Totalt har vi haft export till 55 länder över hela världen, så här finns stora möjligheter för dig som drivs av internationell försäljning. Subec är ett företag med djup insikt i branschen, vilket i kombination med många års erfarenhet ger en fördel som hjälper oss bygga starka kundrelationer. Vår kundorienterade kultur går genom hela organisationen och långsiktiga återkommande kunder är beviset på vårt engagemang.
   

  

 Vi har en produktionsenhet i Lettland sedan 1994, men Subec har funnits sedan 1986. Vårt kontor med trevliga lokaler ligger i Sickla Köpkvarter.
   

  

**Arbetsbeskrivning**
 Som teknisk affärsutvecklare på Subec ansvarar du för att skapa, utveckla och bibehålla affärsrelationer med befintliga och potentiella kunder för att på bästa sätt sälja in våra produkter. Ditt uppdrag är att säkerställa utvecklingen och du arbetar i nära relation med kund och de företag vi representerar. Din uppgift blir också att räkna på priser och ta fram lösningar efter kundens behov eller önskemål.
   

  

 Subec erbjuder ett brett sortiment inom:
   

  

* Processrelaterad utrusting inom kabel-, tråd- och rörindustrin
* Guide- och mätsystem
* Riktverk
* Drivenheter m.m


 Du arbetar med hela vårt produktsortiment och bearbetar både nya och befintliga kunder med support från dig och dina leverantörer. Vi tror på frihet under ansvar och du planerar själv ditt arbete, dock gör vi mycket tillsammans. Du har kunder i flera olika länder.
   

  

**Vad har Jonathan Lundsjö, Product Manager, att säga om tjänsten och företaget?**
*"Min bakgrund är inom maskinteknik och ledarskap, med 6 års erfarenhet inom kabel-, tråd- och rörbranschen. Jag har haft roller inom produktdesign, maskinbyggande och tekniskt sälj. Som Product Manager på Subec har jag varit involverad i projekt globalt i 2 år, från idé till konstruktion, tillverkning och driftsättning.*
*Subec erbjuder frihet under ansvar och möjligheter till personlig och professionell utveckling. Vi värdesätter en trivsam arbetsmiljö och balans i arbetslivet. Jag hoppas att min blivande kollega delar mitt intresse för teknik och utveckling, och att vi kan sporra varandra i Subecs produktutveckling. En egen drivkraft och glimten i ögat i en snabb arbetsmiljö är uppskattat.*
*Det mest stimulerande med jobbet är att arbeta i ett mindre bolag med korta beslutsvägar, samtidigt som man hanterar globala projekt. Möjligheten att resa och arbeta med kunder runt om i världen är spännande, och att arbeta med ett sammansvetsat team av kollegor är en bonus."*
**Din profil**
 Till rollen som teknisk affärsutvecklare söker vi dig som är lösningsorienterad, resultatdriven och självgående med hög aktivitet. Du trivs med att driva processer framåt är analytisk och förstår tillverkningsprocesser.
   

  

 Din sociala kompetens och förmåga att skapa förtroende i dina relationer kommer vara avgörande som teknisk affärsutvecklare. I denna roll gäller det att lyssna och komma med ett väl utvecklat förslag till kunden. Du har stor frihet och möjlighet att själv planera ditt arbete.
   

  

 Språkkunskaper:
   

  

* För den ena tjänsten är det ett krav att du har mycket goda kunskaper i tyska
* För den andra tjänsten är det ett krav att du har mycket goda kunskaper i franska alternativt spanska


 Vi ser gärna att du har:
   

  

* Teknisk kompetens och utbildning
* Erfarenhet av B2B-försäljning
* Erfarenhet från industri
* B-körkort
* God IT-förståelse
* Svenska och engelska i tal och skrift
* Stor vilja att resa i tjänst


**Kontakt och ansökan**
 I denna rekrytering samarbetar vi med Säljpoolens rekryteringskonsult Ulf Hammar. Du når Ulf på 08-51481646.
   

  

 Skicka in din ansökan via ansökningsknappen. Vi arbetar med löpande urval under denna rekrytering, vi vill därför gärna ha in din ansökan snarast möjligt.
   

  

**Välkommen med din ansökan!**

title: Cybersäkerhetsspecialist – Stockholm
description:
Vi på Bahnhof är inte bara en av Nordens ledande bredbandsoperatörer – vi är också i framkant när det gäller IT-säkerhet. Nu söker vi dig som också brinner för cybersäkerhet och som drivs av att ligga steget före nästa hot.
   

  

 Är du vår nästa säkerhetshjälte?
   

  

**Om rollen**
 Som cybersäkerhetsspecialist blir du en nyckelspelare i vårt säkerhetsteam. Du kommer att jobba praktiskt och nära tekniken, men också bidra till att sprida säkerhetsmedvetande i hela organisationen. Det här är rollen för dig som älskar att gräva djupt, testa gränserna – och samtidigt göra internet säkrare.
   

  

**Vad Du Kommer Att Göra Hos Oss**
* Genomföra penetrationstester, sårbarhetsanalyser och säkerhetsgranskningar.
* Arbeta nära våra tekniker för att identifiera och åtgärda säkerhetsrisker.
* Utvärdera och upprätthålla säkerhetsnivån i olika operativsystem och tekniska miljöer.
* Hålla dig uppdaterad inom säkerhetsområdet via forum, rapporter och annan omvärldsbevakning.
* Bidra till en säkerhetsmedveten kultur inom organisationen


**Vi Söker Dig Som Har**
* Gedigen erfarenhet av olika operativsystem (Linux, Windows, macOS etc).
* Praktisk erfarenhet av penetrationstester, verktyg och metoder.
* Ett brinnande intresse för IT-säkerhet – du är nyfiken och håller dig uppdaterad via bloggar, forum och communities.
* Förmåga att kommunicera och samarbeta effektivt med både tekniker och andra intressenter.


**Ett Plus Om Du**
* Labbar hemifrån och bygger egna säkerhetsprojekt på fritiden.
* Har certifieringar inom cybersäkerhet (t.ex. OSCP, CEH, CISSP).
* Har erfarenheter av säkerhetsövervakning, incidenthantering eller digital forensik.


**Varför Bahnhof?**
 Hos oss får du arbeta med engagerade kollegor, spännande teknik och en organisation som tar säkerhet på allvar. Vi erbjuder frihet under ansvar, möjlighet till kompetensutveckling och en miljö där egna idéer och initiativ uppmuntras.
   

  

**Ansökan**
 Tjänsten är på heltid med fast månadslön och inleds med en provanställning på sex månader. Du kommer att utgå från vårt datacenter Pionen, centralt beläget på Renstiernas gata 37 i Stockholm.
   

  

 Skicka ditt CV, personliga brev och löneanspråk till jobb@bahnhof.net senast den
 **23 maj 2025** 
 . Ange ”Cybersäkerhetsspecialist” i ämnesraden. Vi genomför intervjuer löpande och tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas före sista ansökningsdag. Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!

title: Test Rig Developer (software programmer)
description:
Scania is undergoing a transformation from being a leading supplier of trucks, buses, and engines to providing complete and sustainable transport solutions. Together with TRATON and our sister brands MAN, Volkswagen Truck & Bus, and International, we are working to shape the future of mobility with innovative and environmentally conscious solutions. Our values – customer first, respect, team spirit, responsibility, and elimination of waste – are at the heart of everything we do. Together, we are at the forefront of creating a sustainable future.
   

  

 As part of our Battery Production team, you’ll play a crucial role in shaping the electric mobility landscape.
   

  

**Role Summary**
 We are seeking an experienced and self-driven Test Rig Developer with focus on Software Programming to join our In-house EOL project team. In this role, you will be responsible for developing and implementing a testing software interface to communicate between the test rig and the battery management system to perform low voltage and high voltage tests according to our quality assurance standards.
   

  

 As a software developer in Scania, you are a vital part in providing premium products, services and solutions to Scanias customers, partners, employees and many more kinds of stakeholders. It is your responsibility to work closely with both internal and external stakeholders, to develop software that is of high quality and performance, thus contributing to the holistic premium experience of Scania.
   

  

**Job Responsibilities**
* Develop and implement software for test rigs used in battery component and system testing.
* Design and execute test cases.
* Integrate software and hardware components.
* Perform system integration and validation.
* Collaborate with electrical engineers, EOL engineers, and R&D developers.
* Provide training and guidance to your team colleagues.
* Document and report test results and findings.
* Develop a scalable concept for enhancing testing solutions and integrating them seamlessly into existing test rigs.


**Who You Are**
 Key Skillset:
   

  

  

* Strong programming knowledge with a solid understanding of electrical systems, including battery management systems, CAN and UDS protocols, and safety.
* Proficiency in test tools such as LabVIEW, CANalyzer, CANoe, ETAS INCA, etc.
* Knowledge of interfacing test tools with PLCs.
* Ability to interpret electrical schematics.
* Demonstrate creativity and solution-oriented thinking.


 Educational Background:
   

  

  

* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, or a related field.


 Experience:
   

  

  

* Proven experience in software development, preferably in test rig or automation systems.
* Proven experience in industrial testing, preferably in battery systems.


 Skills:
   

  

  

* Strong problem-solving skills and adaptability to work in a dynamic environment.
* Strong analytical skills and attention to detail.
* Familiarity with testing equipment and data analysis tools.
* Excellent communication and experience working with cross-functional teams.


 Mindset:
   

  

  

* A proactive approach with a focus on prioritizing and delivering high-quality results.
* Passion for sustainable technology and a commitment to safety.


 This is us
   

  

 The EOL Testing engineering team at Scania Battery Production is home to a dynamic, highly skilled group of engineers from diverse backgrounds who specialize in delivering innovative solutions in the field of battery testing in a production environment. Our team combines deep technical expertise with a proactive, problem-solving approach, fostering an environment where creativity and efficiency meet to drive impactful results for our projects. With a strong focus on professional development and a supportive culture, the EOL Testing engineering team is dedicated to both individual growth and collective success, making it an exciting and empowering place to be a part of.
   

  

**Scania offers**
 At Scania, we offer a dynamic workplace with opportunities for hybrid work and flexible hours in certain departments and roles – for example, through the Scania Sergel and Midway hubs –
 **where the nature of the work allows it.** 
 However, this particular position requires on-site presence at the office/production facility and
 **cannot be performed remotely.** 
 With a structured development plan and courses, Scania supports your career growth both locally and internationally. Benefits include training at our health center Gröndal or wellness allowance, result bonus, flexible hours, and company car leasing. Scania also hosts events for employees and their families, and Stockholm residents enjoy direct access to Södertälje via Scania Job express buses.
   

  

**Application**
 Your application should include a CV and any relevant certificates. We welcome all applicants and strive for diversity in our recruitment processes. Apply as soon as possible, no later than 2025-05-22. Screening will take place on an ongoing basis during the application period. Logical and personality tests may be used as part of the selection process, and a background check may be required for this role. If you have questions or would like more information, please contact Manager - EoL and SPCT Engineering Mathe Cecilia, cecilia.mathe@scania.com
   

  

**Job Requisition 17543**

title: Senior Fullstack Engineer - Platform Focus
company_industry: Information Services and Technology, Information and Internet
description:
**This is Mevisio**
 Mevisio is a powerful platform designed to elevate operational performance for leaders and teams, driving efficiency through smart visualization and enhanced communication. Our application transforms traditional whiteboards into interactive touch screens, displaying real-time KPIs and activities tailored to each client's needs. Trusted by global companies and digital leaders, Mevisio is deployed in over 3,000 facilities across 60+ countries, with more than half of our revenue coming from international markets.
   

  

 Our customizable platform integrates seamlessly with other systems, supporting clients in diverse industries, particularly manufacturing and healthcare, where Lean principles thrive. By reducing waste and boosting safety and sustainability, Mevisio empowers organizations to achieve operational excellence and improve their overall performance.
   

  

**Why Mevisio?**
 At Mevisio, we combine an inclusive and friendly culture with a strong drive to achieve our high ambitions—because we know that success happens together. Here, you’ll work in a cross-functional environment, giving you the opportunity to make a real impact on both technology and product.
   

  

 Our customers are large enterprises with high demands on scalability, security, and quality—challenges that inspire our team and push us to grow. As a full-stack developer, you’ll be involved in the entire development journey, from idea to production, and take an active role in our structured product discovery process. Here, it’s not just about delivering—it’s about innovating and having fun along the way!
   

  

*Check out our career page to get to know us more! ➡️https://careers.mevisio.com*
**What will you do?**
 As a Senior Fullstack Engineer With a Platform Focus, You’ll Be a Key Player In The Evolution Of Mevisio’s Platform. Your Work Will Be a Mix Of Hands-on Development And Strategic Improvements To Our Infrastructure, Ensuring Scalability, Security, And Performance. On a Daily Basis, You Will
   

  

**Drive our Infrastructure as Code strategy;** 
 using Terraform and Kubernetes to automate deployments and ensure smooth operations in AWS.
   

  

**Optimize platform performance;** 
 refining event-driven and asynchronous processing using technologies like AMQP and Redis.
   

  

**Contribute to secure high-quality code;** 
 following Mevisio’s secure coding guidelines and peer-reviewing pull requests.
   

  

**Monitor and enhance system reliability;** 
 using observability tools to track real-time performance and proactively address potential issues.
   

  

**Collaborate across teams and customers;** 
 participating in planning, discovery, and retrospectives to ensure alignment between engineering, sales, and customer needs.
   

  

**Develop and maintain core services in our microservice-based architecture;** 
 focusing on scalability and resilience.
   

  

 Desired Technical Skills
   

  

**Platform Engineering:** 
 Proficiency in Infrastructure as Code practices, particularly using Terraform and Kubernetes in AWS environments. Familiarity with security best practices within these areas is a significant plus.
   

  

**Cloud:** 
 Experience and interest in AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, and Terraform.
   

  

**Language:** 
 High proficiency in TypeScript and asynchronous programming.
   

  

**Service Layer:** 
 High proficiency in Node.js, including frameworks, with a strong understanding of core concepts such as event-driven architecture, the Node event loop, memory management, and asynchronous programming principles.
   

  

**Data/Communication:** 
 Experience of MongoDB, Redis, and AMQP.
   

  

**Other Perks And Benefits**
 🚆 Centrally located office near public transit
   

  

 🏖️ 30 paid holidays annually
   

  

 💪 Attractive wellness contribution
   

  

 📈 Pension plan
   

  

 🪐 Opportunities for professional development
   

  

 🔕 Flexible working hours and hybrid office setup
   

  

 👟 Access to a nearby gym
   

  

 🎊 Regular social gatherings and team activities
   

  

 🏢 Centrally located office with modern amenities
   

  

 💻 Latest tech gear
   

  

 ☕️ Breakfast every day, coffee and tea
   

  

**This is a great opportunity for you who want to use your expertise and yet get challenged from day to day! Come join us!**
*Note: This is an internal recruitment by Mevisio. Therefore, we kindly ask external recruitment firms not to contact us!*

title: Data Scientist
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.
   

  

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*
**Job Description**
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business needs and provide analytical solutions
* Build and deploy predictive models and perform statistical analyses
* Develop clear, impactful dashboards and visualizations using Power BI, Spotfire, or Tableau
* Work with large datasets using Python, R, SQL, Databricks, or similar tools
* Apply tools like ChatGPT and Excel Copilot to enhance analytical workflows
* Communicate complex findings clearly to both technical and non-technical audiences


**Your Profile (Must-have Requirements)**
* Strong problem-solving skills with a high attention to detail
* Proficiency in data science tools and programming languages
* Experience in developing machine learning models
* Effective communication and project management skills


**Application deadline:** 
 12-05-2025
   

  

**About Us**
 We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.
   

  

 Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?
   

  

 We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.
   

  

 🌟 A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.
   

  

 🚗 Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.
   

  

 💼 Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.
   

  

 🌴 Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?
   

  

 🏥 Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.
   

  

 📚 Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.
   

  

 🕑 Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?
   

  

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Mystery Shopper / Freelancer (m/f/d) in Sweden
description:
concertare is a German company specialized in customer relationship management.
   

  

 We organize visits, calls and mystery emails throughout the country to obtain an assessment of customer satisfaction and quality of service.
   

  

 Our clients are enterprises from the TOP 500. We offer a full range of services for our clients designed to reach lasting and valuable relationships with their customers.
 


  

 Tasks
   


 Mission
   

  

 We are looking for mystery shoppers all over the country to conduct field surveys.
   

  

 You will have to pretend to be a brand customer and evaluate the quality of the service. This can be done by email, phone, or on the spot.
   

  

 Your experience will then have to be entered in an online questionnaire.
 


  

 Requirements
   


 Requirements
   

  

 - very good observation skills
   

  

 - excellent time management
   

  

 - excellent writing skills
   

  

 - flexibility
   

  

 - availability
   

  

 - computer skills
   

  

 - if you own a car, it's a plus!
 


  

 Benefits
   

 Attractive remuneration
   

  


 We look forward to receiving your application.

title: IT-säkerhetsansvarig
description:
**Har du en passion för IT-säkerhet och vill vara med och skydda en av Sveriges mest framstående fackföreningar?** 
 Vi söker nu en
 **IT-säkerhetsansvarig** 
 som kommer att spela en nyckelroll i att säkerställa säkerheten i vår hybrida IT-infrastruktur.
 



  





 Kommunal är en fackförening med över en halv miljon medlemmar. Vi finns i fler än 230 yrken i kommuner, regioner och den privata sektorn. Vi är en viktig samhällspolitisk aktör i Sverige och en modern fackförening med yrkesskickliga medlemmar och anställda som tillsammans arbetar för att tillvarata medlemmarnas intressen på arbetsmarknaden och i samhällslivet i stort.
 



  





 Som IT-säkerhetsansvarig på IT-enheten kommer du att ha en central roll i att implementera, underhålla och vidareutveckla IT-säkerhetsrelaterade funktioner. Du kommer att arbeta med att proaktivt och effektivt hantera larm och IT-relaterade hot mot Kommunal. Tjänsten är placerad i Stockholm, och du kommer att samarbeta nära med både interna och externa intressenter för att säkerställa att våra IT-lösningar är säkra och effektiva.
 



  





  





**Arbetsuppgifter** 




 Tjänsten innebär att delta i arbetet med förbundets hybrida IT-infrastruktur, vilket omfattar både traditionell on-prem-baserad drift och molnbaserade tjänster. Fokus ligger på IT-säkerhet kopplat till servrar, nätverk, åtkomst och IT-kommunikation. Kommunals IT-miljö baseras huvudsakligen på produkter från Microsoft.
 



  





 I rollen ingår att implementera, underhålla och vidareutveckla IT-säkerhetsrelaterade funktioner för att proaktivt hantera och förebygga IT-relaterade hot. Eftersom Kommunal arbetar med en outsourcad driftmiljö är det centralt att du har förmåga att samarbeta med externa leverantörer. Du förväntas följa upp leveranser, agera stöd vid felsökning och bidra i diskussioner kopplade till IT-säkerhet och IT-arkitektur.
 



  





 Du kommer även att delta som tekniskt expertstöd i utvecklingsprojekt och fungera som en teknisk representant gentemot verksamhetens förvaltningsledare.
 



  





  





**Kvalifikationer** 




 Vi söker dig som har:
 


* Eftergymnasial utbildning eller motsvarande arbetslivserfarenhet.
* Minst 3 års dokumenterad och praktisk erfarenhet av IT-säkerhet.
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av att arbeta i eller leda IT-relaterade projekt.
* God kännedom om IT-säkerhet, certifikat, kryptering samt Microsoft-miljö.
* Förståelse för molnbaserade tjänster och IT-infrastruktur, med fokus på Azure.
* Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska, samt goda kunskaper i engelska, både i tal och skrift.



  





  





**Meriterande** 



* Produktspecifika certifieringar kopplat till IT-säkerhet (t.ex. Sentinel, Azure Monitor, Microsoft Defender).
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med en hybridiserad driftmiljö och samarbeta med externa leverantörer.
* Erfarenhet av logganalys och automatiserad larmhantering.
* Arbetat med en SOC och förstår hur styrning och uppföljning mot en sådan funktion kan göras.
* Arbetat med ISO 27001 eller annat certifieringsramverk för informationssäkerhet.
* Kunskap om och erfarenhet av CIS Controls.
* Erfarenhet av verktyg som Crowdstrike.
* Grundläggande kunskaper kring GDPR.



  





  





**Personliga egenskaper** 




 I denna rekrytering värdesätter vi dina personliga egenskaper högt. Du är en strukturerad och noggrann person som har lätt för att prioritera, koordinera och följa upp ditt arbete. Du trivs i en lagspelarroll där du aktivt bidrar till IT-enhetens gemensamma mål. Med ett lösningsorienterat förhållningssätt tar du dig an utmaningar och arbetar systematiskt för att hitta och presentera hållbara lösningar.
 



  





 Din förmåga att kommunicera och samarbeta, både internt och externt, är avgörande för att lyckas i rollen. Med ett professionellt och ansvarstagande arbetssätt är du en viktig del av teamet som agerar i linje med våra värdeord: Handlingskraft, Proffsighet, Samarbete och Ansvar.
 



  





  





**Anställningsvillkor och förmåner** 




 Vi erbjuder en tillsvidareanställning på heltid med placering på Kommunals förbundskontor, Hagagatan 2, i centrala Stockholm. Provanställning på 6 månader kan tillämpas. Tillträde sker enligt överenskommelse.
 



 Kommunal arbetar aktivt för jämställdhet och mångfald i arbetslivet. Vi vill tillvarata de positiva effekter som en jämn könsfördelning och en ökad mångfald kan tillföra verksamheten. Vi förutsätter att du som söker delar Kommunals värderingar och inser värdet av fackligt arbete.
 



  





 Det är viktigt för oss att du ska trivas och må bra på din arbetsplats. Som anställd på Kommunal erbjuder vi dig ett arbete med kunniga och engagerade kollegor i en trivsam miljö med möjlighet till utveckling i linje med ditt uppdrag.
